choose.when: select no,title,contents, category_no as categoryNo, reg_date as regDate from post where (category_no in (select no from category where blog_id='shin6_0@jblog.com')) order by no asc

select no,title,contents, category_no as categoryNo, reg_date as regDate from post where (category_no in (select no from category where blog_id='shin6_0@jblog.com')) AND category_no = #{categoryNo} order by no asc
choose.otherwise: select no,title,contents, category_no as categoryNo, reg_date as regDate from post where (category_no in (select no from category where blog_id='shin6_0@jblog.com')) AND category_no = #{categoryNo} AND no = #{postNo} order by no asc
